channel.title: CVE Feed for vivo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vivo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12485|2024-09-16T17:58:52.888Z -- vivo -- the%20frame%20touch%20module
item.description: The frame touch module does not make validity judgments on parameter lengths when processing specific parameters,which caused out of the boundary when memory access.The vulnerability eventually leads to a local DOS on the device.
